function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of standardized protocols for smart city products","Impact":"Inefficient communication and data fragmentation, which hinders effective urban risk management","Mitigation":"Development and implementation of open protocols for IoT devices, ensuring data integrity and safety","Technologies":"IoT devices that support open protocols, data encryption, and secure transmission","People":"Urban managers, healthcare professionals, and the public","Owner":"Technology providers, urban management authorities"},{"Description":"Fragmentation of information due to proprietary solutions in smart city products","Impact":"Partial and incomplete view of urban dynamics, hindering effective decision-making for outbreak containment","Mitigation":"Adoption of standardized communication and data sharing protocols, utilization of open and interoperable solutions","Technologies":"Standardized communication protocols, open-source solutions, interoperable technologies","People":"Urban managers, healthcare professionals, and the public","Owner":"Technology providers, urban management authorities"},{"Description":"Rise in the amount of health data generated by IoT devices","Impact":"Increased risk of data privacy and security breaches, potential misuse of health data","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust data security measures, including encryption, access control, and user consent mechanisms","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control mechanisms, user consent frameworks","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, and the public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"}]}
